page.title: 10RHUM PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content:
The school building is situated on the southern shore of Loch Scresort just above the shoreline. The schoolhouse is adjacent to this building.
The school is run by Highland Regional Council and lies within the Lochaber Division of this region.
It is non_denominational and accepts P.1 _ P.7 pupils (approx. 5_11 years old) of either sex. At the end of this stage of schooling pupils have to transfer to the mainland.
It is a single_teacher school with five pupils on the roll at present (June 1985).
The school is well equipped with modern teaching aids such as a colour television and a computer.
